Communication Tips

  • Your goal here is to set up a date to meet in person.
  • Suggest a specific place, day and time.
  • Send one longer message, rather than many short ones.
  • Exchange phone numbers. If you don’t feel comfortable just use this chat.
  • Respect our member’s time, do not engage in long pre-date interviews.
  • Never send money via Western Union or PayPal in advance.
